mapper.insert: insert into user_openid (id, openid, max_num, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, openid, max_num, create_time, modify_time from user_openid
